quote: It is often safer to be in chains than to be free.  – Franz Kafka
fact: Arnold Schonberg suffered from triskaidecaphobia, the fear of the number 13.  He died at 13 minutes from midnight on Friday the 13th.
joke: I am terrified of elevators. I’m going to start taking steps to avoid them.
